description: ff. 74. 154 x 84; 115 x 55 mm. 21 lin. Muḥarram 1122, Aḥmad ibn Sulaymān al-Maḥāsinī. In Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 949 (no. 12) incorrectly attributed to Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz al-ḥanafī-cf. Muḥarram Ill, 322, lin. 17; Baghdādī, Īḍāḥ al-maknūn, II, 121. Incip.: الحمد لله المحىط علما * بما لدىنا والمفىض حلما
author: Muḥibb al-Dīn, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr, 1542 or 3-1607 or 8.
creator: Muḥibb al-Dīn, Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr, 1542 or 3-1607 or 8.
